name: Fable Deck - Single Player DeckBuilder
description:
"Fable Deck" is a single player deck-building card game played on a strategic board.

Play on the side of monsters facing against the human army, as you use your cards to cast spells and summon units to defeat your enemies.

Features:
  • Deckbuilding
    • Upgrade your cards and make your deck stronger after every battle
  • More Features in the future as this project develops:
    • Leave comments below on what you'd like to see!
Controls:

Click on cards to play from the bottom, and click on the board to play them. Each card has an associated mana cost indicated on the top left of the card, and you are given a max of 3 mana per round.

Click on one of yourunits to move or attack an enemy within their range. Clicking on the enemy shows their movement range and what they are about to do next turn. 

After every battle, you will be given a choice to upgrade/acquire new cards. Read their descriptions to find out what they do!
